PineappleMan929.spellcheck: no more cum in common language

PineappleMan929.balance: Removes (the extremely dead) Psydon's traits, giving them to the inquisition only instead.

tired-wired.rscadd: Added Kiha's halfling lore to the primer.

tired-wired.bugfix: Inspector's halberd SHOULD be selectable now.

SarmentiCampbell.bugfix: Church Roles can no longer be heretics with the special trait.

SarmentiCampbell.rscadd: Harpy Acolytes now receive Eoran Charm as a extra T3.
Eoran and Abyssorites Templar can now choose between two weapons, RK get Knuckles or Katar in their seleciton

Snack-Max.bugfix: Abyssorite Templar armor have side sleeves

Gatsby229.rscadd:
Added Death Shell
add:Added grenade shells
add:Added grenade shells smithing recipe.
add:Added Canister bomb to the inquis shop, have fun you grenzelhoftan psychos
add:Made blastpowder crafted with bombcrafting
add:Made breaching charges crafted with bombcrafting
add:Added Death Shell artificer recipe

KevinfromHP.rscadd: New Chasm tiles that drop you into a random part of the Tomb of Matthios with more than likely a few broken limbs.

KevinfromHP.map: New area to Vanderlin Keep next to Treasury.

KevinfromHP.qol: Archivist can now summon parchment/scrolls as spells.

KevinfromHP.rscadd: You can now wash off flammables in water by washing yourself or entering it for a period of time.
Water will now soak you as you remain in it. Soaking prevents fire but will dry off after a while.
Pyromaniacs can now sate their addiction by examining someone who is on fire rather than needing to be close to them. This doesn't apply to non-mobs.

KevinfromHP.balance: Being soaked dissipates at 40% the rate it previously did.
Removed the need to be scrubbed by someone else when using herbal soap to acquire the buff, but shortened it's duration to 10 minutes instead of 15.

KevinfromHP.rscadd: Hidden levers can be detected by looking around, similar to a trap. Only visible to those who meet the perception DC of the lever.

KevinfromHP.qol: Roles that know the keep's hidden door passwords now have it added to their memories.

KevinfromHP.balance: Hidden doors and levers now have a perception DC to be used. A standard hidden door/lever has a DC of 10. A keep door/lever is 14. Thieves Guild members and Assassins get a +2 bonus to this check.

KevinfromHP.map: Re-added Keep architectural plans to Vanderlin's archive room. These are used to reveal the locations of the hidden doors.

wgtjunior743.rscadd: an Abyssor Helmet and Armor and a way to craft them.

wgtjunior743.admin: New admin command to give someone a heart attack

wgtjunior743.bugfix: more than 1 one person not being able to roll for a migrant job even if it had more than 1 slot.

wgtjunior743.code_imp: Rare Classes does not count toward the limit of classes in the class menu.

wgtjunior743.bugfix: wanted poster not appearing the ressurection

wgtjunior743.rscadd: a New Veteran class called : \"Faded Brawler\"

CheffieGithub.rscadd: Added dynamic wounds to replace tiered wounds for carbon mobs.

CheffieGithub.balance: All carbon wound sources will scale differently when it comes to damage, sew time, bleed etc.

Rannoooo.balance: Ravager and Reaver gain a iron hauberk instead of a shirt
Reaver loses nopainstun in exchange for ignoredamageslowdown
Ranger gains skilled knives and +1 perception, loses 1 str and medium armor trait. Gains high collier and gambeson

Rannoooo.qol: All subclasses spawn with average sewing.

Rannoooo.balance: Brigand buffed from average wrestling to expert, like sellsword. -3 int turned into -1 int.

Dorodomki.balance: reinforced the men at arms loadouts

Dorodomki.rscadd:
Added new clothing, dagger and flint to the merchant pilgrim

Arkatos.rscadd: Added an option to have random culinary preferences, which will reward you with limited triumphs when consumed. You can now also view your culinary preferences in your character's memories.
